div.head: 1 October 1714. – Letter of Paolo Arcoleo to the chancellor Count Gavrila Ivanovich Golovkin

opener.note: RGADA, fond 41, opis 1, 1714, no. 3, f. 3-4v. Italian original; Russian translation: ibid., f. 1-2v.
